title: Carousel
description: Carousel contains two or more placeholders which can be swiped from one to another.

default:Html.html:
Anything can be rendered in Carousel's placeholders, just like any other object extending the placeholder class.
Each non visible node is blured while the visible one is focussed.

main:Html.html: Here is an Icebreg with content hidden at the bottom.

properties.name: container
properties.desc: selector where to create this object

properties.name: min_x
properties.desc: drag distance minimum before auto swipe

properties.name: anim
properties.desc: if switching between panels is animated

properties.name: drag
properties.desc: if the end user can swipe/drag

properties.name: dots
properties.desc: if the component displays dots to show the number of panels

methods.name: val
methods.desc: set or retrieve the current index

methods.name: addNode
methods.desc: add a panel and render an OML node in it

methods.name: removeNode
methods.desc: remove an OML node and its panel

methods.name: showPanel
methods.desc: show a panel given an index

methods.name: removePanel
methods.desc: remove panel given index, and OML node if any

events.name: OGX.Carousel.DRAG
events.desc: when the end user starts dragging

events.name: OGX.Carousel.CHANGE
events.desc: when a new panel is shown

events.name: OGX.Carousel.RESTORE
events.desc: when a drag didn't transform in a swipe
